tooltip.soulshards.allow_shard_combine: Allow combining of soul shards with an anvil
tooltip.soulshards.allow_boss_spawns: Allow soul cages to spawn bosses (unsupported, use at your own risk)
tooltip.soulshards.absorb_bonus: Kills added to shard on absorbing a spawner
tooltip.soulshards.count_cage_born: Count cage born (spawned by soul cage) mobs for soul shard kills
tooltip.soulshards.require_owner_online: Require owner of soul shard to be online for soul cage to operate
tooltip.soulshards.require_redstone: Require a redstone signal for soul cage to operate
tooltip.soulshards.spawn_cap: Max number of mobs in the area around a soul cage
tooltip.soulshards.display_durability_ba: Display percentage filled of soul shard as durability bar
tooltip.soulshards.drop_xp: Should cage born mobs drop xp
tooltip.soulshards.disabled_entities: These entities will not be spawnable by a soul cage
chat.soulshards.absorb_disabled: §cThe shard seems to refuse the trapped soul...
commands.soulshards.set_ent.success: Set bound entity of held shard to %s.
commands.soulshards.set_kills.success: Set kill count of held shard to %d.
commands.soulshards.set_owner.success: Set owner of held shard to %s.
commands.soulshards.error.not_a_shard: Held item is not a Soul Shard.
enchantment.soulshards.soul_stealer.desc: Increases the souls collected per kill by one per level.
jei.soulshards.soul_shard.desc: A vessel for the Souls of the slain.\n\nObtained by creating a structure in the world and using a %s on the origin block.
desc.soulshards.soulshard_crafting: Right click the origin block with the catalyst to make a soul shard
desc.soulshards.cursing: Throw the input item into a cursed fire (create by using flint & quartz on soul sand)
gamerule.allowCageSpawns: Allow mobs to be spawned via soul cages
